rooms.description: A spacious entrance that doubles as a living area, designed to welcome family members and guests. It features comfortable seating arrangements and Bohemian decor with colorful textiles and vintage accents.
A semi-open dining area adjoining the living space, facilitating easy communication between family members. Rustic wooden furniture and Bohemian accents are used to enhance warmth.
A compact, functional kitchen with modern appliances and traditional Indian design elements. An open plan layout aids in ventilation and energy efficiency.

A private bedroom for the senior family members, featuring a large window to ensure ample natural light while respecting Vastu principles. The room includes built-in storage and space for decorative art.
A versatile studio bedroom used by the younger family members, combining living and sleeping areas with an emphasis on Bohemian style through eclectic decor and colorful patterns.
A flexible space that can serve as a study, guest room, or meditation area. Designed to incorporate natural elements and Bohemian art pieces.

openings.description: The main entrance is positioned to align with Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow and enhancing security.
Large windows that provide ample morning light to the living area, balancing the Western exposure of the plot.
Strategically placed to enhance natural light and maintain a pleasant sleeping environment.
Windows designed to maximize daylight while offering privacy for the studio bedroom.
An external balcony that overlooks a large garden, designed for relaxation and connecting with nature.

features: Flowering plants in the periphery, local herbs, seating areas

plot_info.additional_details: The design incorporates irregular plot shape optimizations by aligning rooms in a way that maximizes usable space while ensuring balance and harmony with Vastu. The large garden is integrated into the overall layout for recreational and aesthetic purposes.

rooms.description: A comfortably sized guest bedroom for visiting relatives, featuring traditional Indian textiles and Bohemian art to maintain continuity in style.
A dedicated study area with ample natural light and integrated storage solutions, suitable for the joint family's academic pursuits.

vastu_considerations.energy_flow: The layout is carefully designed to ensure smooth energy flow, respecting traditional Vastu principles while embracing Bohemian aesthetics.
